languages.text: "Могу вас понять, {name}. Но долг перед {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g} редко бывает приятным бременем — особенно для тех, кто наделен большой властью".

traits.locale_text: "Могу вас понять, {name}. Но долг перед Золотым Троном редко бывает приятным бременем — особенно для тех, кто наделен большой властью".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."
languages.original_text: "Могу вас понять, {name}. Но долг перед {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g} редко бывает приятным бременем — особенно для тех, кто наделен большой властью".

traits.locale_text: "I understand where you're coming from, {name}. But the duty to the Golden Throne is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in the position of great power."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand where you're coming from, {name}. But the duty to the Golden Throne is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in the position of great power."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the Golden Throne is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the Golden Throne is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、それも承知だ。だが、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に仕える義務は苦痛を伴う重荷であることが多いもの――特に権力の座についているものであれば、なおさらだ」
languages.original_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、それも承知だ。だが、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に仕える義務は苦痛を伴う重荷であることが多いもの――特に権力の座についているものであれば、なおさらだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我可以理解，{name}。不过，{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的职责并不是件令人愉快的负担，对那些位高权重的人而言更是如此。”
languages.original_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."

traits.locale_text: “我可以理解，{name}。不过，{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的职责并不是件令人愉快的负担，对那些位高权重的人而言更是如此。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Lo comprendo, {name}. Mas su deber para con el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} no es una carga pesada; sobre todo para aquellos con tamaño poder».
languages.original_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."

traits.locale_text: «Lo comprendo, {name}. Mas su deber para con el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} no es una carga pesada; sobre todo para aquellos con tamaño poder».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je comprends, {name}. Cependant, le devoir envers le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} est un fardeau rarement plaisant à porter, surtout quand on possède un grand pouvoir. »
languages.original_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends, {name}. Cependant, le devoir envers le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} est un fardeau rarement plaisant à porter, surtout quand on possède un grand pouvoir. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verstehe, {name}. Aber die Pflicht gegenüber dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} ist selten eine angenehme Bürde – vor allem für jene in Machtpositionen."
languages.original_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe, {name}. Aber die Pflicht gegenüber dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} ist selten eine angenehme Bürde – vor allem für jene in Machtpositionen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Anlıyorum {name}. {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'a{/g} olan vazifelerimiz, nadiren taşıması hoş yüklerdir. Bilhassa da büyük güce sahip olanlarımızın vazifeleri."
languages.original_text: "I understand, {name}. But duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} is seldom a pleasant burden to bear — especially for those in a position of great power."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum {name}. Fakat genelde {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} vazifeleri taşıması zor birer yük olur, özellikle de büyük bir güce sahip olanlar için."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
